artist: Artist: Hara Yōyūsai; Designer: Sakai Hōitsu
catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 805
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: tan gourd painted with grapevine and tendrils; grape flower at L
medium: Gourd with lacquer and gold; metal fittings, silk cord
signed: on back, in gold: (Brushed by Hōitsu); {Yōyūsai}
text: Several lacquer articles and objects in other media produced by Hara Yōyūsai feature designs by his contemporary, Sakai Hōitsu. Yōyūsai used albums of Hōitsu’s designs to trace and transfer them to lacquer objects. Here, Yōyūsai paints a design of vines by Hōitsu in lacquer and gold on a gourd.
title: Gourd painted with vine leaves
